answers.answer: I Have the same problem  when I am sleeping the numbness of my hands  wake me up   and when i wake up I have tu shake my hands for the blood to circulateI am 42 years old and I have this problem from 8 years ago. please if you find info regarding this problem  or the name of this problem let me knowTHANKYOU     ***@****

Hi,Just a few questions:Do you snore?Have you been diagnosed with sleep apnea?Do you have any weight problems?Is there a strong history of cardiac disease , diabetes and stroke in the family?Do keep us posted with your answers.

question: Almost every night I awaken and either both or one of my hands are numb.  I can usually move it enough to relieve the numbness, yet I know this is not normal, as I am not sleeping on my hands, nor do I have them positioned so they should lose blood flow.  This has been happening for about 6 months, and I am now becoming concerned as to what could be the cause of this problem.  Any answers????
title: Numbness in hands when sleeping
